titleStmt.title: Farther arguments, for passing the bill against the sale of offices humbly offer'd to the House of Lords, as it has pass'd the honourable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Whiston, James, 1637?-1707.

notesStmt.note: By James whiston, whose name appears in the text.
Appealing for the cessation of sale of public offices.
